title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, LendingClub CEO
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, LendingClub CEO
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Dave Wilson Stocks Editor Bloomberg News Discussing his Chart of the Day "Risk in U.S. stocks doesn't pay enough to suit Pimco." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart. Scott C Sanborn Chief Executive Officer LendingClub Discussing the company's path to recovery and bringing investors back to the platform.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
